quest.name: I Order You to Relax
journal:
 Quest Sync
A rather serene observer looks at you with more than a hint of concern.
objectives: Do a nice, big /stretch near the carefree observer.

dialogue.name: CLAMOBSERVER04286
dialogue.text: A familiar, and all alone, I see. And look at how thin you are!

dialogue.name: CLAMOBSERVER04286
dialogue.text: If your remaining aether were to be exhausted, you'd simply fade from existence, and we wouldn't want that, now would we? I suggest you visit the Mourning Dew. You'll find the winds blowing in from Lethe most invigorating!

dialogue.name: CLAMOBSERVER04286
dialogue.text: Perhaps while you're there, you might seek out a friend of mine, and invite him to share a meal with me. If it's not too much to ask, that is.

dialogue.name: CLAMOBSERVER04286
dialogue.text: The Mourning Dew may sound a rather morbid place, but it's quite pleasant, I assure you.

dialogue.name: CLAMOBSERVER04286
dialogue.text: My friend often goes there only to be lost in a peaceful, dreamlike state. I do wish he'd remember to eat more often, though.

dialogue.name: BREAKOBSERVER04286
dialogue.text: Hmm? What brings you here, O friendly familiar?

dialogue.name: BREAKOBSERVER04286
dialogue.text: Time for a meal, eh? Ah, yes. Quite right. Thank you for reminding me.

dialogue.name: BREAKOBSERVER04286
dialogue.text: Still, a few more moments here can't hurt, surely?

dialogue.name: BREAKOBSERVER04286
dialogue.text: I daresay you've noticed how refreshing it is to even stand in this idyllic place. The air itself is permeated with rich aether, and the fine droplets from Lethe ease the aches from a hard day's work. Try a nice, big stretch─you won't regret it!

dialogue.name: BREAKOBSERVER04286
dialogue.text: The best way to experience the healing atmosphere is to take a deep breath and stretch!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The observer looks at you as if to say, “That's a funny-looking stretch!”

dialogue.name: BREAKOBSERVER04286
dialogue.text: See what I mean? The wind through the leaves, the waterfall's soothing spray─there's nothing quite like it!

dialogue.name: BREAKOBSERVER04286
dialogue.text: In our busy, day-to-day lives, it's all too easy to forget to look after ourselves. Naturally, that includes familiars.

dialogue.name: BREAKOBSERVER04286
dialogue.text: Speaking of which, I'd best get something to eat, as you so kindly came here to tell me. As you seem new to these parts, my friend will probably be wondering whether you've lost your way. Go and put his mind at ease, would you?

dialogue.name: CLAMOBSERVER04286
dialogue.text: Here to report on the successful completion of the favor I asked of you? How very dutiful of you!

dialogue.name: CLAMOBSERVER04286
dialogue.text: Would I be correct in guessing your little jaunt has paid dividends? Ha, no need to tell me, I can see you're practically bursting with vim and vigor.

dialogue.name: CLAMOBSERVER04286
dialogue.text: Why, even I feel better just looking at you, and I've done nothing but stand here the entire time!
